title: How to Make Easy Cheesy Bacon Biscuit Pull Aparts

steps.headline: Preheat your oven to 325°F (160°C) and line a 9” square baking pan with aluminum foil.
Line the pan with the biscuits.
Top each biscuit with half of a slice of Swiss of cheddar cheese.
Crumble or chop the cooked bacon into small pieces.
Sprinkle the bacon over the cheese.
Cover the bacon with the shredded cheese.
Bake the dish according to the biscuit package directions, or about 20 minutes.
steps.description: The cheese should be melted and the biscuit dough cooked through before you remove the pan from the oven.

steps.headline: Serve them while they're still warm.

text: Preheat your oven to 325°F (160°C) and line a 9” square baking pan with aluminum foil.  Line the pan with the biscuits.  Top each biscuit with half of a slice of Swiss of cheddar cheese.  Crumble or chop the cooked bacon into small pieces.  Sprinkle the bacon over the cheese.  Cover the bacon with the shredded cheese.  Bake the dish according to the biscuit package directions, or about 20 minutes. The cheese should be melted and the biscuit dough cooked through before you remove the pan from the oven. Serve them while they're still warm.
